folder: New Dorp Lane & 3rd Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
New Dorp Lane, at the N.E. corner of 3rd Street, showing Our Lady Queen of Peace Roman Catholic Church.

August 2, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: New Dorp Lane & 3rd Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) New Dorp Lane, north side, between 4th and 3rd Streets, showing the parochial school of the Roman Catholic Church of Our Lady Queen of Peace and part of the church.

August 2, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(2) Another view of the school, at a later date, showing an addition. The church appears in full. The view is west from 4th Street.

May 26, 1935

P. L. Sperr

folder: New Dorp Lane & 3rd Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) New Dorp Lane, north side, between 4th and 3rd Streets, showing the parochial school of the Roman Catholic Church of Our Lady Queen of Peace and part of the church.

August 2, 1929

folder: 3rd Street & New Dorp Lane, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
3rd Street, east side, between New Dorp Lane and Rose Ave. (New Dorp), showing the Chiesa della Trinita, an Italian Moravian church. It is also known as Trinity Moravian (Italian) church.

August 2, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, another view. The house on the right, adjoins the
church to the south and bears No. 130.

P. L. Sperr.

August 2, 1929.
